!Neti: Why, greetings! I see you are a frequent traveler. Well, have you been here and there? Since I got married, I am at home all day long, so sometimes I feel stifled. These days, I recollect the old memories of when I roamed around the kingdom. There were many hardships, but I miss the days when I could enjoy adventure and romance ...
